CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: C has just reached in house
M picks up toy designated as Mom
C watches while M manipulates dishes; pours from teapot into cup
M pours from pitcher in cup; makes pouring noise
M picks up container with lid; spoons in cup
C finishes drinking; hands cup to M who is manipulating dishes
<bef> M manipulates dishes; C looks in house; watches her
M takes things out of house and sets near C
C holds up a toy; hesitates
M pulls a crib out of house
M waves hand over area near her with dishes
M holds up a pot; hands to C
M hands a spoon to C
C pours from cup in pot
C picks container designated as sugar
C covers sugar bowl; sets down; lifts teapot; C pours with teapot
C pours from teapot in cup; makes pouring noise; pours from cup in something else
C continues to manipulate dishes; M watches; <aft> M hands C a spoon
M and C are looking at Care Bear feelings book
C holds book; M turns pages return to front of book
M starts to turn page; C stops her
C closes Care_Bear book; picks another
M helps C pick up book he wants
M makes motion with her finger of brushing teeth
C makes motion of brushing teeth
M points at another place on page
C starts to turn page: M stops him
M points at a third place on page
M points at a different picture
